ygData.subject: Re: Since you brought it up
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *shrugs* I ve only got tolerance up to about 12 or so...but I ve found that being drunk seems to help fishing (some joke of the dev team?).  I managed to
ygData.messageBody:
> Perhaps if it gets high enough, you get the increased stats without the
> side effects - but still - is this just something that the dev team got a
> chuckle out of - or is it useful to build?
>
> We got any harddrinking bards here?

*shrugs* I've only got tolerance up to about 12 or so...but I've found
that being drunk seems to help fishing (some joke of the dev team?). I
managed to catch 20 fish in less time than normal (even ran out of bait
and had to make my way, carefully, over to the bait shop for more).

Grei of Bristlebane

--

If we're going to have fun, we've got to be serious about it.
